@sunblock
In addition to having SSV2, the Proper release has a different Game CRC than the previous version available.

Previous release Game CRC: 61CB5A8F
PROPER release Game CRC:  8BEC1F2B

That means one of the two has a corrupt game partition.
How do you know what the game crc is? I cant find it in abgx?

Check the following on the options tab:
Check for AnyDVD style game data corruption
Check Game Partition CRC when needed

Then the game CRC will be checked and output with the rest of the check. It's a good idea to save those settings as your default along with setting AutoFix to Level 3 in the AutoFix tab. It takes longer to run through abgx360 when you check that data, but it's the only way to be safe from corrupt game data (once the title verifies or if you can compare 2 releases as in this case).
